name: Start Point - Hue
description: Meet at the parking lot by the river. Registration opens at 7am.
directions_note: Look for the Point to Point banner

name: Bắc Sơn Viewpoint
description: Stunning valley views - one of the best in Vietnam! Worth the climb.
directions_note: Take the dirt road on your left after km marker 45

name: Mama's Kitchen
description: Best bánh mì in the province. Try the special!
directions_note: Look for the blue sign on the main road

name: River Crossing Alpha
description: Shallow crossing point - check depth before crossing!
directions_note: Only cross if water is below knee height

name: Fuel Stop - A Lưới
description: Last petrol station before the mountain section

name: Hidden Waterfall
description: Beautiful swimming spot. Take a break!
directions_note: Park bikes and walk 200m down the trail

name: Checkpoint Charlie
description: Mandatory checkpoint - get your card stamped

name: Danger Zone
description: Technical rocky section - take it slow!
directions_note: Walk it if you're not confident

name: Homestay Hub
directions_note: Check in with the host family

name: Finish Line - Đông Sơn
description: Congratulations! You made it! Party starts at 6pm.
